AT.name: FAST Racing NEO
AT.description: "Fast Racing Neo is a superb racing game." (Nintendo World Report, 9/10) "Every single track is gorgeous, bursting with detail and full of life." (Nintendo Life, 9/10) "A ride you definitely shouldn't miss." (GameCrate, 9/10) Rase in FAST Racing NEO mit atemberaubender Geschwindigkeit durch eine futuristische Sci-Fi-Welt. Setz dich ans Steuer deines Anti-Schwerkraft-Fahrzeugs und zeig auf der Strecke dein Können. Spiele im Splitscreen gegen 3 Freunde oder stelle dich im Internet bis zu 8 Spielern aus der ganzen Welt. Rase durch verlassene Minen tief unter der Erde, dichte Dschungel, futuristische Städte, durchquere gewaltige Wüsten und katapultiere dich in die Atmosphäre und noch viel weiter. Werde zur Legende und meistere alle Kurse selbst auf der höchsten Geschwindigkeit! Features: • Stell dich mit deinem Anti-Schwerkraft-Fahrzeug der Herausforderung dieses blitzschnellen Arcade-Rennspiels • Düse auf 16 Strecken durch Schluchten, Berghänge, Ozeane, futuristische Städte und mehr • Meistere die Kunst zur richtigen Zeit den Turbo zu zünden und deine Phase zu wechseln, um der Konkurrenz davonzufahren • Lokaler und Online-Mehrspieler-Modus • Schalte den HERO-MODUS frei und stelle dich neuen Herausforderungen mit neuen Regeln!

movies.name: FAST Racing NEO: NEO FUTURE PACK
FAST Racing NEO Trailer

AU.name: FAST Racing NEO
AU.description: "Fast Racing Neo is a superb racing game." (Nintendo World Report, 9/10) "Every single track is gorgeous, bursting with detail and full of life." (Nintendo Life, 9/10) "A ride you definitely shouldn't miss." (GameCrate, 9/10) Race through a futuristic sci-fi world at incredible speeds in FAST Racing NEO. Jump into the driver’s seat of your anti-gravity vehicle and put your skills to the test in high octane competitions. Play locally with four of your friends in splitscreen or online against 8 players from all around the world. Race through abandoned mines in the depths of the earth, to dense jungle areas, futuristic cities, crossing vast deserts and finally up into the stratosphere and beyond. Become a legend and master all courses on even the highest speed! Features: • Race anti-gravity vehicles in this lightning-fast arcade racer • Zoom through 16 tracks set in canyons, alpine peaks, oceans, futuristic cities and more • Master the art of boosting and phase switching to stay ahead of the competition • Local and online multiplayer • Unlock the HERO MODE to play with new rules and new challenges!

movies.name: FAST Racing NEO: NEO FUTURE PACK
FAST Racing NEO Trailer

movies.name: FAST Racing NEO: NEO FUTURE PACK

BE.name: FAST Racing NEO
BE.description: "Fast Racing Neo is a superb racing game." (Nintendo World Report, 9/10) "Every single track is gorgeous, bursting with detail and full of life." (Nintendo Life, 9/10) "A ride you definitely shouldn't miss." (GameCrate, 9/10) Faites la course dans un univers de science-fiction futuriste avec FAST Racing NEO. Montez à bord de votre véhicule antigravité, et mettez vos talents de pilote à rude épreuve dans des compétitions intenses. Jouez en local et en écran splitté avec 4 amis, ou en ligne contre 8 joueurs du monde entier. Faites la course à travers des mines abandonnées dans les profondeurs de la Terre, et parcourez des jungles épaisses et des villes futuristes jusqu'à vous aventurer dans la stratosphère et au-delà. Devenez une véritable légende et maîtrisez toutes les pistes à la vitesse la plus élevée ! Caractéristiques : • Pilotez des véhicules antigravité dans ce jeu de course d'arcade frénétique • Parcourez 16 circuits situés dans des canyons, des monts alpins, des océans, des villes futuristes et bien plus encore • Maîtrisez l'art du turbo et du changement de phase pour rester en première place • Multijoueur local et en ligne • Débloquez le MODE HERO, jouez avec de nouvelles règles et relevez de nouveaux défis !

movies.name: FAST Racing NEO: NEO FUTURE PACK
Vidéo de FAST Racing NEO

movies.name: FAST Racing NEO: NEO FUTURE PACK

ES.name: FAST Racing NEO
ES.description: "Fast Racing Neo is a superb racing game." (Nintendo World Report, 9/10) "Every single track is gorgeous, bursting with detail and full of life." (Nintendo Life, 9/10) "A ride you definitely shouldn't miss." (GameCrate, 9/10) Recorre a velocidades increíbles un mundo futurista de ciencia ficción en FAST Racing NEO. Ponte al volante de tu vehículo antigravedad y pon a prueba tus habilidades en competiciones de alto octanaje. Juega con cuatro amigos en modo local a pantalla dividida o compite online con 8 jugadores de todo el mundo. Recorre minas abandonadas en las profundidades de la tierra, densas áreas selváticas, ciudades futuristas, cruza vastos desiertos y llega por fin a la estratosfera y más allá. ¡Conviértete en una leyenda y domina todos los circuitos, incluso a la máxima velocidad! Características: • Pilota vehículos antigravedad en este trepidante juego de carreras • Recorre a toda velocidad 16 circuitos ambientados en cañones, cumbres alpinas, océanos, ciudades futuristas, etc. • Domina el arte de acelerar y cambiar de fase para sacar ventaja a tus competidores • Multijugador local y online • ¡Desbloquea el MODO HERO para jugar con nuevas reglas y nuevos desafíos!

movies.name: FAST Racing NEO: NEO FUTURE PACK

IT.name: FAST Racing NEO
IT.description: "Fast Racing Neo is a superb racing game." (Nintendo World Report, 9/10) "Every single track is gorgeous, bursting with detail and full of life." (Nintendo Life, 9/10) "A ride you definitely shouldn't miss." (GameCrate, 9/10) Gareggia alla velocità della luce nell'universo fantascientifico di FAST Racing NEO. Salta al volante del tuo veicolo antigravitazionale e metti alla prova le tue abilità in gare adrenaliniche. Gioca in locale con quattro giocatori in modalità split screen oppure online contro 8 giocatori da tutto il mondo. Sfreccia nelle miniere abbandonate nelle viscere della terra, nella giungla più fitta e in città futuristiche. Attraversa immensi deserti fino a raggiungere e oltrepassare la stratosfera. Diventa una leggenda e impara a guidare alla perfezione su qualsiasi pista a velocità incredibili! Caratteristiche: • Gareggia con veicoli antigravitazionali in questo gioco di corse arcade ad altissima velocità • Sfreccia su 16 tracciati ambientati tra canyon, vette alpine, oceani, città futuristiche e molto altro ancora • Perfeziona l'arte dell'uso della nitro e della fasatura per essere sempre in testa alla gara • Multigiocatore in locale e online • Sblocca la MODALITÀ HERO per giocare con nuove regole e sfide mai provate prima!

movies.name: FAST Racing NEO: NEO FUTURE PACK

movies.name: FAST Racing NEO: NEO FUTURE PACK

(Nintendo Life, 9/10) "A ride you definitely shouldn't miss." (GameCrate, 9/10) Race through a futuristic sci-fi world at incredible speeds in FAST Racing NEO. Jump into the driver’s seat of your anti-gravity vehicle and put your skills to the test in high octane competitions. Play locally with four of your friends in splitscreen or online against 8 players from all around the world. Race through abandoned mines in the depths of the earth, to dense jungle areas, futuristic cities, crossing vast deserts and finally up into the stratosphere and beyond. movies.name: FAST Racing NEO: NEO FUTURE PACK
FAST Racing NEO Trailer

NL.name: FAST Racing NEO
NL.description: "Fast Racing Neo is a superb racing game." (Nintendo World Report, 9/10) "Every single track is gorgeous, bursting with detail and full of life." (Nintendo Life, 9/10) "A ride you definitely shouldn't miss." (GameCrate, 9/10) Race met een ongelofelijke snelheid door een futuristische sci-fi wereld in FAST Racing NEO. Spring achter het stuur van je zwaartekracht-verachtende voertuig en stel je skills op de proef in high-octane competities. Speel lokaal met vier vrienden in split-screen races of online tegen acht spelers over de hele wereld. Race door verlaten mijnen naar het diepst van de aarde, door dichtbegroeide junglegebieden, futuristische steden, uitgestrekte woestijnen en uiteindelijk in de stratosfeer en daarbuiten. Word een legende en beheers alle circuits, zelfs op de hoogste snelheid! Kenmerken: • Bestuur anti-zwaartekracht voertuigen in deze bliksemsnelle arcaderacer • Flits over 16 tracks gelegen in kloven, bergen, oceanen, futuristische steden en meer • Beheers de kunst van boosten en fase-overschakeling om de competitie voor te blijven • Lokale en online multiplayer • Ontgrendel de HERO-MODUS om met nieuwe regels en uitdagingen te spelen!
